data.message: i was on youtube again and listened to the other linkin park songs with you and forget what i said before the calloberations was the shit excellent what ive been waiting and looking for now keep it up oh yeah its fort minor now all that shit youve been talking about that you are one of the number one artist in the rap game i can now also vouch for an A plus baby. i also go to the edge water library to listen to your jams which some how some way we need to get played on the radio, my address is 5450 n winthrop ave chicago illinois 60640 apt 205 aisha howard
